 17 /**
 18  * Creates a new cache instance.
 19  *
 20  * @class Tile cache for the {@link bigshot.TileLayer}.
 21  * @constructor
 22  */
 23 bigshot.ImageTileCache = function (onLoaded, onCacheInit, parameters) {
 24     var that = this;
 25     
 26     this.parameters = parameters;
 27     
 28     /**
 29      * Reduced-resolution preview of the full image.
 30      * Loaded from the "poster" image created by 
 31      * MakeImagePyramid
 32      *
 33      * @private
 34      * @type HTMLImageElement
 35      */
 36     this.fullImage = null;
 37     parameters.dataLoader.loadImage (parameters.fileSystem.getPosterFilename (), function (tile) {
 38             that.fullImage = tile;
 39             if (onCacheInit) {
 40                 onCacheInit ();
 41             }
 42         });
 43     
 44     /**
 45      * Maximum number of tiles in the cache.
 46      * @private
 47      * @type int
 48      */
 49     this.maxCacheSize = 512;
 50     this.maxTileX = 0;
 51     this.maxTileY = 0;
 52     this.cachedImages = {};
 53     this.requestedImages = {};
 54     this.usedImages = {};
 55     this.lastOnLoadFiredAt = 0;
 56     this.imageRequests = 0;
 57     this.lruMap = new bigshot.LRUMap ();
 58     this.onLoaded = onLoaded;
 59     this.browser = new bigshot.Browser ();
 60     this.partialImageSize = parameters.tileSize / 4;
 61     this.POSTER_ZOOM_LEVEL = Math.log (parameters.posterSize / Math.max (parameters.width, parameters.height)) / Math.log (2);
 62 }
 63 
 64 bigshot.ImageTileCache.prototype = {
 65     resetUsed : function () {
 66         this.usedImages = {};
 67     },
 68     
 69     setMaxTiles : function (mtx, mty) {
 70         this.maxTileX = mtx;
 71         this.maxTileY = mty;
 72     },
 73     
 74     getPartialImage : function (tileX, tileY, zoomLevel) {
 75         var img = this.getPartialImageFromDownsampled (tileX, tileY, zoomLevel, 0, 0, this.parameters.tileSize, this.parameters.tileSize);
 76         if (img == null) {
 77             img = this.getPartialImageFromPoster (tileX, tileY, zoomLevel);
 78         }
 79         return img;
 80     },
 81     
 82     getPartialImageFromPoster : function (tileX, tileY, zoomLevel) {
 83         if (this.fullImage && this.fullImage.complete) {
 84             var posterScale = this.fullImage.width / this.parameters.width;
 85             var tileSizeAtZoom = posterScale * this.parameters.tileSize / Math.pow (2, zoomLevel);
 86             
 87             x0 = Math.floor (tileSizeAtZoom * tileX);
 88             y0 = Math.floor (tileSizeAtZoom * tileY);
 89             w = Math.floor (tileSizeAtZoom);
 90             h = Math.floor (tileSizeAtZoom);
 91             
 92             return this.createPartialImage (this.fullImage, this.fullImage.width, x0, y0, w, h);
 93         } else {
 94             return null;
 95         }
 96     },
 97     
 98     createPartialImage : function (sourceImage, expectedSourceImageSize, x0, y0, w, h) {
 99         var canvas = document.createElement ("canvas");
100         if (!canvas["width"]) {
101             return null;
102         }
103         canvas.width = this.partialImageSize;
104         canvas.height = this.partialImageSize;
105         var ctx = canvas.getContext('2d'); 
106         
107         var scale = sourceImage.width / expectedSourceImageSize;
108         
109         var sx = Math.floor (x0 * scale);
110         var sy = Math.floor (y0 * scale);
111         var dw = this.partialImageSize;
112         var dh = this.partialImageSize;
113         
114         w *= scale;
115         if (sx + w >= sourceImage.width) {
116             var w0 = w;
117             w = sourceImage.width - sx;
118             dw *= w / w0;
119         }
120         
121         h *= scale;
122         if (sy + h >= sourceImage.height) {
123             var h0 = h;
124             h = sourceImage.height - sy;
125             dh *= h / h0;
126         }
127         
128         try {
129             ctx.drawImage (sourceImage, sx, sy, w, h, -0.1, -0.1, dw + 0.2, dh + 0.2);
130         } catch (e) {
131             // DOM INDEX error on iPad.
132             return null;
133         }
134         
135         return canvas;
136     },
137     
138     getPartialImageFromDownsampled : function (tileX, tileY, zoomLevel, x0, y0, w, h) {
139         // Give up if the poster image has higher resolution.
140         if (zoomLevel < this.POSTER_ZOOM_LEVEL || zoomLevel < this.parameters.minZoom) {
141             return null;
142         }
143         
144         var key = this.getImageKey (tileX, tileY, zoomLevel);
145         var sourceImage = this.cachedImages[key];
146         
147         if (sourceImage == null) {
148             this.requestImage (tileX, tileY, zoomLevel);
149         }
150         
151         if (sourceImage) {
152             return this.createPartialImage (sourceImage, this.parameters.tileSize, x0, y0, w, h);
153         } else {
154             w /= 2;
155             h /= 2;
156             x0 /= 2;
157             y0 /= 2;
158             if ((tileX % 2) == 1) {
159                 x0 += this.parameters.tileSize / 2;
160             }
161             if ((tileY % 2) == 1) {
162                 y0 += this.parameters.tileSize / 2;
163             }
164             tileX = Math.floor (tileX / 2);
165             tileY = Math.floor (tileY / 2);
166             --zoomLevel;
167             return this.getPartialImageFromDownsampled (tileX, tileY, zoomLevel, x0, y0, w, h);
168         }        
169     },
170     
171     getEmptyImage : function () {
172         var tile = document.createElement ("img");
173         if (this.parameters.emptyImage) {
174             tile.src = this.parameters.emptyImage;
175         } else {
176             tile.src = "data:image/gif,GIF89a%01%00%01%00%80%00%00%00%00%00%FF%FF%FF!%F9%04%00%00%00%00%00%2C%00%00%00%00%01%00%01%00%00%02%02D%01%00%3B";
177         }
178         return tile;
179     },
180     
181     getImage : function (tileX, tileY, zoomLevel) {
182         if (tileX < 0 || tileY < 0 || tileX >= this.maxTileX || tileY >= this.maxTileY) {
183             return this.getEmptyImage ();
184         }
185         
186         var key = this.getImageKey (tileX, tileY, zoomLevel);
187         this.lruMap.access (key);
188         
189         if (this.cachedImages[key]) {
190             if (this.usedImages[key]) {
191                 var tile = this.parameters.dataLoader.loadImage (this.getImageFilename (tileX, tileY, zoomLevel));
192                 tile.isPartial = false;
193                 return tile;
194             } else {
195                 this.usedImages[key] = true;
196                 var img = this.cachedImages[key];
197                 return img;
198             }
199         } else {
200             this.requestImage (tileX, tileY, zoomLevel);
201             var img = this.getPartialImage (tileX, tileY, zoomLevel);
202             if (img != null) {
203                 img.isPartial = true;
204                 this.cachedImages[key] = img;
205             } else {
206                 img = this.getEmptyImage ();
207                 if (img != null) {
208                     img.isPartial = true;
209                 }
210             }
211             return img;
212         }
213     },
214     
215     requestImage : function (tileX, tileY, zoomLevel) {
216         var key = this.getImageKey (tileX, tileY, zoomLevel);
217         if (!this.requestedImages[key]) {
218             this.imageRequests++;
219             var that = this;
220             this.requestedImages[key] = true;
221             this.parameters.dataLoader.loadImage (this.getImageFilename (tileX, tileY, zoomLevel), function (tile) {
222                     delete that.requestedImages[key];
223                     that.imageRequests--;
224                     tile.isPartial = false;
225                     that.cachedImages[key] = tile;
226                     that.fireOnLoad ();
227                 });            
228         }            
229     },
230     
231     /**
232      * Fires the onload event, if it hasn't been fired for at least 50 ms
233      */
234     fireOnLoad : function () {
235         var now = new Date();
236         if (this.imageRequests == 0 || now.getTime () > (this.lastOnLoadFiredAt + 50)) {
237             this.purgeCache ();
238             this.lastOnLoadFiredAt = now.getTime ();
239             this.onLoaded ();
240         }
241     },
242     
243     /**
244      * Removes the least-recently used objects from the cache,
245      * if the size of the cache exceeds the maximum cache size.
246      * A maximum of four objects will be removed per call.
247      *
248      * @private
249      */
250     purgeCache : function () {
251         for (var i = 0; i < 4; ++i) {
252             if (this.lruMap.getSize () > this.maxCacheSize) {
253                 var leastUsed = this.lruMap.leastUsed ();
254                 this.lruMap.remove (leastUsed);
255                 delete this.cachedImages[leastUsed];                    
256             }
257         }
258     },
259     
260     getImageKey : function (tileX, tileY, zoomLevel) {
261         return "I" + tileX + "_" + tileY + "_" + zoomLevel;
262     },
263     
264     getImageFilename : function (tileX, tileY, zoomLevel) {
265         var f = this.parameters.fileSystem.getImageFilename (tileX, tileY, zoomLevel);
266         return f;
267     }
268 };
269
